Content.Title: translationstudio
Content.Teaser: Benefit from the advantages of professional translation management and translation automation.

children.text: translationstudio connects CMS, DXP, DAM or PIM with translation management systems (TMS).
Editors can easily translate content into the desired target languages and reimport the translated content ... completely automatically.

Content.Title: It couldn't be simpler
Content.Text: The editors have enough to do and translations can be commissioned without any expert knowledge.

Content.Title: Consistent translations for your entire DXP!
Content.Text: With translationstudio, you can integrate translations into your DXP in a consistent and coherent way: whether CMS, DAM or PIM, translationstudio connects them with leading translation management systems “out of the box”. We also integrate proprietary interfaces or special systems from translation service providers.

Content.Title: Machine Translations
Content.Text: translationstudio connects to market leading machine translation services out of the box. Custom AI translations are also possible, of course.

Content.Title: Translation Memory Systems
Content.Text: Translators work most efficient using their familiar professional tools. translationstudio connects with them, out of the box.

Content.Title: Concentrate on what you do best
Content.Text: and leave the tedious and time-consuming tasks to translationstudio.
